params.amount: The total amount of tokens to be vested.
params.beneficiary: The address that will receive the vested tokens.
params.cliffDuration: The duration in seconds during which no tokens are vested.
params.duration: The total duration of the vesting period in seconds.
params.revocable: A flag indicating whether the vesting can be revoked by the owner.
params.startTime: The timestamp when the vesting period begins. Use 0 for current block timestamp.

returns.vestingAddress: The address of the newly created vesting contract.

returns._0: An array of vesting contract addresses.

params.newImplementation: The address of the new implementation contract.

createVesting(address,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Creates and initializes a new vesting contract (proxy) for a beneficiary.

getImplementation().notice: Gets the address of the current vesting implementation contract.

getTokenAddress().notice: Gets the address of the token used for vesting.

getVestingsByBeneficiary(address).notice: Retrieves all vesting contracts created for a specific beneficiary.

getVestingsByOwner(address).notice: Retrieves all vesting contracts created by a specific owner.

setImplementation(address).notice: Sets a new implementation address for future vesting contract creations.
